short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Suspender suspends tabs which are in background for long periods, to reduce RAM usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲'𝘀 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗧𝗮𝗯 𝗦𝘂𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿!
🔄 𝗧𝗮𝗯 𝗦𝘂𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 is designed to suspend tabs that have been sitting in the background for extended periods, helping you 𝗿𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗥𝗔𝗠 𝘂𝘀𝗮𝗴𝗲. 💻
💡 𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲 𝗧𝗮𝗯 𝗦𝘂𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿?
Automatically suspends inactive tabs that haven’t been used for a certain amount of time ⏲️, freeing up valuable memory and keeping your device running smoothly.
Perfect for users who multitask with multiple tabs open 🌐, ensuring your browser doesn't slow down your system.
🔋 With 𝗧𝗮𝗯 𝗦𝘂𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿,you’ll experience a noticeable 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲, allowing your device to run faster and more efficiently. Say goodbye to lag and enjoy a smoother browsing experience! 🌟
